title: HTR Audio Brief: The 2026 Policy Landscape
summary: Listen to our 5-minute executive summary of the upcoming legislative session. We cover the top 3 bills impacting reimbursement.

children.text: For executives on the go, we have condensed our 40-page analysis into a high-level audio briefing. Listen below for the key takeaways on Act 167 and the Federal Data Privacy mandate.
The audio covers the three main friction points: The Global Budget cap rollout, the new interoperability penalties, and the shift in M&A scrutiny.
